question: Which Indian personality has crossed six crore followers on Twitter?
explanation:
Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi has recently crossed six crore followers on micro-blogging platform Twitter.
The Prime Minister joined Twitter in the year 2009 and his handle is following 2,354 accounts. The Twitter handle of the Prime Ministerâ€™s Office (PMO) has 3.7 crore followers. US President Donald Trump has over 8.3 crore followers on Twitter.
